nodes.name: Baar_Dau (COS)
nodes.summary: Standalone version of Baar Dau from the mod "Vivec - City of Swords".Includes the overhauled interior as well as the unique exterior model

nodes.name: Better Main Quest Items
nodes.summary: Improves the primary items the player will receive during the main quest. This includes items received from the Great Houses/Ashlander tribes during the Nerevarine/Hortator lines, as well as items from the Cave of the Incarnate.All 'Cast on

nodes.name: Vivec - City of Swords
nodes.summary: The most comprehensive and extensive Vivec City modThis mod is a complete and total overhaul/upgrade of the city, inside and out. Including a new Foreign Quarter, Libary, Prison Moon, docks, Halls of Justice/Wisdom, canton interiors, and

nodes.name: Drenim Ancestral Tomb
nodes.summary: Delve into the Drenim Ancestral Tomb, found on a new island west of the Sheogorad Region. Neratha Drenim awaits outside with a concerning account of what has just happened inside...
